nfts.title: Bethany Claw
nfts.author: typicode
nfts.description: If your blood didn't make me choke, then you death was meaningless

nfts.title: Zeus Olympus
nfts.author: typicode
nfts.description: Any mortal who sets foot on mount Olympus will feel the wrath of my thunder

nfts.title: Medusa Cobra
nfts.author: typicode
nfts.description: humans Look better as rocks, if you evade that then you shall feel my poisonous hair

nfts.title: helena Sparrow
nfts.author: typicode
nfts.description: The ocean is always flat. If you're not drunk you'll never know

nfts.title: Legolas GreenLeaf
nfts.author: typicode
nfts.description: My cutleries are arrows. If yours don't miss the mouth mine don't miss thier target

nfts.title: Rosemary
nfts.author: typicode
nfts.description: You're just too slow. You dont stand a chance

nfts.title: Thrandruil
nfts.author: typicode
nfts.description: I will severe your head from your miserable body
